creator: apb@jazznsax.com
text:
When I attempted to use htpasswd.exe -c to create a new passwd file, I kept 
getting an error that -n and -c conflict.  Yet, I never issued the -n switch.

Anyway, I reverted to 1.3.26 as it satisfies my needs.

Hope this helps. Hope I didn't submit something you knew.  I did try to find 
this bug reported before.

This is a known bug.  There is a patch available at http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/patches/apply_to_2.0.39/ , and the patch will be included in 2.0.40.  This was first reported in bug 9989. 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9989 ***
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
